TopicTitle: I would like to know what was the max g during re-entry of Apollo 11

Articles.Content:
I would like to know what it looked like during the Apollo missions remaining.

I am in my virtual flight to the Mun, I achieve usually 7.0 to 10 G, during re-entry into the atmosphere

Well according to the flight journal, they said they got 6.3 gs

Sources:

http://history.nasa.gov/ap11fj/26day9-reentry.htm

Edited August 31, 2012 by Cby
Damn punctuation
